title: How to Draw an 'Across the Screen' Frog

steps.headline: Draw a curved line (facing down) all the way across the center your paper.
Draw a shorter curved line under the nostrils and first line.
Add 2 semi-circles wide apart on the  first line you made.
Make pupils on top of the first line, inside the eyes.
Shade the inside any color you like, add spots, or whatever you want.

text: Draw a curved line (facing down) all the way across the center your paper.  Add 2 dots under it. These will be the nostrils. Draw a shorter curved line under the nostrils and first line. This is the mouth. Add 2 semi-circles wide apart on the  first line you made. These are the eyes. Make pupils on top of the first line, inside the eyes. Make them semi-circles. Color them black.  Shade the inside any color you like, add spots, or whatever you want.
